translations: 领会理解；逮捕；忐忑不安地期待（apprehend 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Our well-being comes from many of our way of apprehending the reality!
sentences.translation: 我们的幸福来自于许多我们领悟现实的方式！

sentences.sentence: I think that the human intellect alone simply can't come close to apprehending God.
sentences.translation: 我认为单凭人类的智慧无法更进一步地理解上帝。

sentences.sentence: He accepted revealed truth, but was convinced that one should exercise reason in apprehending the truth.
sentences.translation: 他透露，接受真相，但相信一应行使的原因在逮捕的真相。
